001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.slf4j;
002
003import org.slf4j.Logger;
004
005/**
006 * A marker interface to check if it is a logger that is decorating.
007 */
008public interface WrappingLogger {
009
010        /**
011         * The downstream logger to forward calls to.
012         * @return delegate.
013         */
014        public Logger delegate();
015
016}
